snippet.title: Gameplay Trailer | Thrive: Heavy Lies the Crown | Survival City Builder
snippet.description:
#Thrive Heavy Lies the Crown #City Builder #Gameplay Trailer

Here is the game-play trailer for Thrive: Heavy Lies the Crown (Thrive: HLtC)

Thrive: HLtC is a medieval survival city builder for PC where the fate of your kingdom relies heavily on the choices you make. 

Will you struggle to survive, or find the strength to Thrive?

Wishlist on Steam TODAY
-
👑Steam: https://bit.ly/3bCqd2Q
Discord: http://www.discord.gg/VESRyBM
Website: http://www.thrivehltc.com
Instagram: http://www.instagram.com/thrivehltc
Twitter: http://www.twitter.com/thrivehltc
Reddit: https://www.reddit.com/user/zugaluentertainment
